title: When to make dua and when to make dhikr while praying salah? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: when the Prophet said too hard on his asana say this duaa at the end of your prayer did he mean that we should say it before Salaam or after we conclude the prayer after the Salaam it's an issue of dispute the most authentic opinion that all types of dora of invocation must be done within the prayer itself before you offer setup this is what even Terranea says may Allah have mercy on his soul and his student of Nepali and whatever there is vehicle in it remembrance of Allah Subhan Allah Allahu Akbar etc you say it after the setup
